messages.index.detail.desc-1: Smart contracts allow the performance of credible transactions without third parties. These transactions are trackable and irreversible. The smart contract is simply a piece of code that is running on Ethereum
messages.index.detail.desc-2: Please read it: The first “Terms & conditions”. And the second: “Challenge” to GET 10,000 ETH.
messages.index.detail.desc-3: Ethereum: is currently the 2nd largest market capitalized cryptocurrency in the world and the second place regarding the popularity only after Bitcoin. Ethereum is the first digital currency to have a smart contract. Understandably, smart contracts are a way to distribute cryptocurrencies based on regulations, promises that cannot be edited or canceled after being uploaded and verified [verified] on Ethereum network
messages.index.detail.desc-4: is an application of Ethereum smart contract, it is uploaded to ethereum network and verified [verified]. Therefore, it cannot be altered or deleted by anyone even in their minds and of course even its creator. Cryptolights will always exist even when the website cryptolights.org is hacked and disappeared. The Cryptolights system does not belong to anyone and it operates independently of the website.

messages.come.text2: And the second: {link} to GET 10,000 ETH.
messages.index.how.desc-1: Send 0.1 ETH to your upline, wich will back after the first referral
messages.index.how.desc-2: In 1 click without password (we never ask for private keys)
messages.index.how.desc-3: Attract referrals or wait referrals from the system
messages.index.how.desc-4: Receive funds immediately to ETH wallet without confirmation and payment requests
messages.index.how.desc-5: Repeat it every 6 months to keep your system.
messages.i.block1.title-2: If you have an additional $ 20, it will not make you rich, and losing $ 20 will not make you poor either, but you will have the opportunity to receive 1000 ETH from the support of the community and you are a member of the community.
messages.i.block1.d-1: There is no lie about the number of members in the cryptolights community. Every single eth address represents a community member who wants to help and be truly helped. There is no "virtual" eth address so there will be no virtual members.
messages.i.block1.d-2: Smart Contract of Cryptolights is run on Ethereum's network, Ethereum is a safe and unbreakable blockchain coin. Therefore, it is certain that only when the internet is "Lost" will cryptolights be lost. And this is impossible.
messages.i.block1.d-3: Cryptolights has a mechanism to reward you when you promote and develop the community. The BIG question is, "Where is MONEY to pay bonuses", when Cryptolights works, you will be redirected to your upline for your money. The word "ORIGINAL" here shows you that, Cryptolights has shown its mission to create a community of "TRUE" help because it was created by billionaires in the crypto industry and their mission is to create 10,000  dollar millionaires from this industry to help crypto currencies to be developed and applied around the world. The profitability of cryptolights for them is not as important as the development of the community and creating a truly electronic community of applications in the circulation of money. Their prize to the "REAL" community comes entirely from the common fund of the top billionaires with this great significance.
messages.i.block1.d-4: You will not only receive once with the community where you are. Every 6 months you will have the opportunity to get help again from your community whenever you give away. It is forever and never lost when you still control your ETH wallet address.
messages.i.block2.t1: REAL value comes from BIG ideas to bring to the REAL meaning to the REAL players community.
messages.i.block2.t2: Thank you for coming to Cryptolights.
messages.how.block1.t-1: You will need Ethereum wallet and 0.1 ETH to get started. All the money you need for only one time is 0.1ETH to run for the whole cycle of project, the next times will use the money you have in the community.
messages.how.block1.d1-1: Register and become level 1 in the system. To do this you need to transfer 0.1ETH to your upline via CryptoLights smart contracts. This 0.1ETH will be sent later to you by the first following person. Signing up and Becoming level 1 are concurrently done at the same time, so you need to have 0.1ETH in your ETH wallet which you use to register. Start by clicking on REGISTER.
messages.how.block1.d2-1: Log in to your account with an Ethereum wallet (no password required, you can log in with 1 click). The password is not necessary and it is not possible to create the password for your account with a smart contract, your account is on the smart contract and is visually shown on this web. It is sure that your account is not deleted by the administrator. Make sure that you don't lose your control of your ethereum wallet.
messages.how.block1.d3-1: Get your referral link and send it to those who want to make their dreams true. You will have an additional bonus for this job when you meet the conditions set by CryptoLights. Referrals come to you by 3 ways:
messages.how.block1.d3-2: 1: You introduce yourself with your link.
messages.how.block1.d3-3: 2: You receive from your uplines by "overflow"
messages.how.block1.d3-4: 3: The system sends you free referrals.
messages.how.block1.d4-1: Immediately when the referral appears, you will have money on your ETH wallet without confirming anything. At each level, you will receive correspondences as the table described below. There are 5 levels and the total income is about 1000ETH after 6 months.
messages.how.block1.d5-1: Repeat it every 6 months to keep your system. The system you have will never be lost, if you have a good system, then you will have   more than 6 month-commission before they renew. If the people in your system on a certain level do not renew, the entire ID that is supposed to be passed to them will be transferred to you. Your income will be increased.
messages.cha.block1.d-1: We are technology enthusiasts, always in the top of the trend to apply technology for work and the future. Over 2 years of applying ethereum smart contract to the work as well as the projects of the firms and partners.
messages.cha.block1.d-2: Crypto has helped us earn profits and now we want to redistribute it to  the community. At the same time we want to send you, those who are good at and passionate about technology like our team a challenge with ETH's Smart Contract. Through this challenge, we hope one can  find the bug of ETH's Smart contract "if any", and fix it for our upcoming big application. You can understand that: cryptolights is the place for us to perfect "if any" ETH smart contract to apply it for our upcoming big project in online transactions legally and Globally:
messages.cha.block1.d-3: Specifically, the "challenge": if you delete the payout algorithm of cryptolights or correct it right on ETH's smart contract, We will pay you 10,000 ETH.
messages.cha.block1.d-6: • Your eth address which you want to receive 10,000 ETH in.
messages.cha.block1.d-7: Surely you will get 10,000 ETH if you have done it because our online legal project is worth $ 100 billion, so this will be the fee we want to pay you to receive back this "Fix error".
messages.cha.block1.d-8: Thank you and look forward to hearing from you.
messages.auth.block1.never: We never ask you to enter your private keys.
messages.auth.block1.note1: Pay attention, to make automaticall registration on the mobile device you have to enter to the app, to choose DApp (browser) menu and to enter referral link in the address bar. Then in the same built-in decentralized browser go to the registration page, and make a registration in 1 click.
messages.auth.block1.signenter: Enter your id or Ethereum address of your upline
messages.auth.block1.sign1: Send FROM YOUR Ethereum wallet {amount} ETH to the smart contract address. In the field Input DATA enter Ethereum address of your upline.
messages.auth.block1.sign5: After a successful transaction, registration (1 level purchase) will be automatically completed, and it will be possible to LOG IN to the System.
messages.stats.lostd1: Profit loss - is a purchase of a level by your referral of the appropriate line, if you haven't reached this level yet. In this case the funds will be directed to Your upline of the appropriate line, from whom you can buy this level.
messages.stats.lostd2: For example. Referral of the 3rd line wants to buy the 3rd level from You but you still haven't bought the 2nd level. In this case the money will be directed to your upline of the 3rd line.
messages.stats.lostd3: If your level is active, then even if your referral buys this level many times in a row for many years to come, all this money goes to you.
messages.stats.lostd4: If you have inactive referrals, then all the money that should have gone to them for the corresponding levels goes to you.
messages.ad.title1: There is Bonus for well-done people
messages.ad.d1: The people who create chapters in the desire to have a community helping each other really, they have spent their own money to encourage those who are able to develop the community according to the bonus mechanism announced in the website. These crypto billionaires are looking for "talent" in detecting errors of "Smart Contract" to apply to their global program.
messages.ad.t2: No risk or very small risk
messages.ad.d2: With the operation mechanism of CryptoLights, the cost for you to join once is 0.1ETH and never exceed this amount. It will be called "Zero Risk" when you have your first partner to join you, almost immediately and you don't need to wait. It's called a "very small risk" because 0.1ETH is the equivalent of $ 20 at the moment, it's not such a big deal that you have to commit suicide when you lose it.
messages.ad.d3: You are telling me you join a money making place that you do not work or do not want to work. Of course you have to wait for the system to have new engagements to attach you, this referral could be from Cryptolights or from your upline, when they have 3 referrals, it will be your turn.
messages.ad.d4: If you accidentally enroll in a good team, then after their 3 referrals finished and you are 1 of those 3 referrals, you will get a referral referrals when they have new referrals. Of course this referral will be yours forever and even their profits.
messages.ad.d5: It only happens when the 2nd renew and later, it means after 6 months of operation. It will be a joy for you because your income will increase, all transfers of that level will be transferred to you. For example: If an ID in your 5th level doesn't renew after 6 months, 243 IDs of their 5th level instead of giving back to them will be yours.
messages.ad.d6: This is a system running on eth's smart contract, it has knocked away the management elements, eliminating subjective changes to benefit them leading to community destruction. No one can delete or change the algorithm of crptolights from the Ethereum network (We have a "Challenge" if you can do it now). Therefore, it will last forever
messages.ad.d7: Cryptolights does not hold community money and all transactions that occur are completely and immediately held by participants. Project management, same as you, after cryptolights' Smart contract is put on Ethereum and verified, they do not have access to your money.
messages.ad.d8: When you joined a cryptocurrency program or or takengiven community before, all transactions occur on their website and if their website collapses, then 90% that you you lose your money and system. But cryptolights overcame this issue with smart contracts. If the cryptolights.org website goes down, another programmer can rewrite a similar website and people can transact visually again, and the smart contracts of cryptolights will always exist.
messages.ad.d9: The REPEAT function helps you to get profit every 6 months from the system you currently have. If there is a non-renewing partner in your group, you will have the opportunity to receive additional revenue from the same level they did not renew themselves.
